title: A Look outside (TEFC)
creator_credit: Zero 16 Films, Gibson Film Productions and Dave Gibson
brief_description: An optional job experience scheme from 4th form at Nenae College helps students bridge the gap between the classroom and the world outside. Various students are shown gaining experience as a surveyor’s assistant, hairdresser, vet’s assistant and farm worker, working one day a week along side adults in these fields.
